## Buffer.delete() method

Flags the underlying WebGLBuffer for deletion. The buffer cannot be bound afterwards.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
delete(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
